subtitleNullable: "Facial Mask Segmentation and Recognition Dataset for Computer Vision"
descriptionNullable:
The "MaskGuard" dataset aims to address the growing need for robust facial mask detection and recognition systems, particularly in public health, safety, and AI research domains. This dataset contains a diverse collection of high-quality facial images depicting individuals wearing masks and without masks, captured under various environmental conditions and scenarios.
**~~Content Overview~~**  :      The "MaskGuard" dataset contains a diverse collection of facial images captured under various conditions, portraying individuals wearing masks and without masks.
Dataset contains 3725 mask items are there  and 3828  without mask items are there in dataset.
labels : Mask   , without_Mask
In this Dataset I provide seperate folders for Train and Test.
Sample images are  ,

**Without_Mask :**

| ![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F11250133%2F81645d278513d0ad2d664acf29fc6e88%2Fwithout_mask_3.jpg?generation=1702660926642046&alt=media) | ![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F11250133%2F76ecc8057bddee5b7debdfe4efd149e4%2Fwithout_mask_25.jpg?generation=1702660955720068&alt=media) |
| --- | --- |
| ![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F11250133%2F1eebbb4c102080f4c25e283d5cd9b369%2Fwithout_mask_69.jpg?generation=1702660998996682&alt=media) | ![](https://www.googleapis.com/download/storage/v1/b/kaggle-user-content/o/inbox%2F11250133%2F539b3166d349e28f47173d25cf9aabb0%2Fwithout_mask_4.jpg?generation=1702661095478627&alt=media) |


      



**~~Sources :  ~~  **  The images included in the "MaskGuard" dataset were sourced from multiple publicly available databases, curated datasets, and proprietary sources. To ensure diversity and accuracy, the dataset was meticulously compiled from ethical and legally compliant sources, including:

Publicly accessible image repositories adhering to usage rights (e.g., Creative Commons).

Annotated datasets shared by research institutions and communities focusing on computer vision and AI.

In-house collection, ensuring a wide representation of demographics, mask types, and environmental conditions.

**~~Insipiration : ~~**  The motivation behind creating the "MaskGuard" dataset stemmed from the pressing global need to develop efficient and reliable facial mask detection algorithms. The dataset was inspired by:

The COVID-19 pandemic highlighting the significance of mask-wearing as a preventive measure.
Increasing applications of computer vision and AI in health, security, and everyday life.
The desire to contribute to research and development of accurate, ethical, and versatile mask detection models.

The intention behind sharing this dataset is to facilitate advancements in AI-driven mask detection systems, supporting innovations in public safety, healthcare, and computer vision technology.
